column4: anyone care to help me? i need to install virtualbox from egdy using pnly the update manager??
anyone care to help me? i need to install virtualbox from egdy using pnly the update manager??
go to the virtualbox site, and download the .deb for edgy
after i download the .deb, how will i install it(im a newbie)
it's a package you can install with synaptic.  it will let you install .deb files via gui
so how will i use gdebi
after you install it, you will be able to double-click on the .deb file.
install? like sudo apt-get install gdebi?
sudo apt-get install gdebi wont work,. how can install it via synaptic?
ok im done installin it, so should i proceed with downloading the .deb file?
hang on there ill be right back, ok? ^_^ im back to ask u the how-too's u cool with that?
